Desc.entry: Applicants must be couples, single people, or pensioners who were born in Sheffield and have lived in the city for a major part of their lives. Part-time "Scheme Manager". Weekly maintenance charge, residents pay for their own heating, lighting, water and council tax. Activities include tenants' outings organised by residents and weekly coffee morning. Waiting list in operation, self or any referral. A registered charity.

category.entry: ACCOMMODATION FOR OLDER PEOPLE - SHELTERED HOUSING
